QuestData.Title: Clever Ashyo
QuestData.Description: I'm not sure where Clever Ashyo got his "Clever" title from. All jinyu are clever, and I wouldn't say that he's any more clever than most of them.$b$bQuite the opposite, actually.$b$bAt least he's a capable fighter. He did well enough at Tian Monastery to be selected for our training mission.$b$bIf you want to help him look for the Hidden Master, you can find him along the Valley's northern border.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Clever Ashyo at New Cifera in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: Where have I seen you before?
